org.jboss.windup.decompiler.procyon

Class ProcyonDecompiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.windup.decompiler.procyon.ProcyonDecompiler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Decompiler

    public class ProcyonDecompiler
extends Object
implements Decompiler
    Decompiles Java classes with Procyon Decompiler. See https://bitbucket.org/mstrobel/procyon
    Author:
    Ondrej Zizka, ozizka at redhat.com, Lincoln Baxter, III

                                     Path classFilePath,
                                     File outputDir)
                                       throws DecompilationException
        Decompiles the given .class file and creates the specified output source file.
        Specified by:
        decompileClassFile in interface Decompiler
        Parameters:
        classFilePath - the .class file to be decompiled.
        outputDir - The directory where decompiled .java files will be placed.
        Throws:
        DecompilationException

      • decompileDirectory

        public DecompilationResult decompileDirectory(File rootDir,
                                     File outputDir)
                                       throws DecompilationException
        Decompiles all .class files and archives in the given directory and places results in the specified output directory.

        Discovered archives will be decompiled into directories matching the name of the archive, e.g. foo.ear/bar.jar/src/com/foo/bar/Baz.java.

        Required directories will be created as needed.

        Specified by:
        decompileDirectory in interface Decompiler
        Parameters:
        rootDir - The directory containing source files and archives.
        outputDir - The directory where decompiled .java files will be placed.
        Throws:
        DecompilationException

      • setExecutorService

        public void setExecutorService(ExecutorService service,
                      int numberOfThreads)

      • decompileArchive

        public DecompilationResult decompileArchive(File archive,
                                   File outputDir,
                                   DecompilationListener listener)
                                     throws DecompilationException
        Decompiles all .class files and nested archives in the given archive.

        Nested archives will be decompiled into directories matching the name of the archive, e.g. foo.ear/bar.jar/src/com/foo/bar/Baz.java.

        Required directories will be created as needed.

        Specified by:
        decompileArchive in interface Decompiler
        Parameters:
        archive - The archive containing source files and archives.
        outputDir - The directory where decompiled .java files will be placed.
        listener - This is called after each successful decompilation
        Throws:
        DecompilationException

      • decompileArchive

        public DecompilationResult decompileArchive(File archive,
                                   File outputDir,
                                   Filter<ZipEntry> filter,
                                   DecompilationListener listener)
                                     throws DecompilationException
        Decompiles .class files and nested archives in the given archive, as allowed by the given filter.

        Nested archives will be decompiled into directories matching the name of the archive, e.g. foo.ear/bar.jar/src/com/foo/bar/Baz.java.

        Required directories will be created as needed.

        Specified by:
        decompileArchive in interface Decompiler
        Parameters:
        archive - The archive containing source files and archives.
        outputDir - The directory where decompiled .java files will be placed.
        filter - Decides which classes will be decompiled.
        listener - This is called after each successful decompilation
        Throws:
        DecompilationException
